page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: I get up at 6.45am. I dress tidy my room and have breakfast. I get ready for school and if theres time I help Dad look after the poultry goats and cat. My friend Emma's mother and my mother take turns to take us and my sister Hannah to school by 8.40.am. After assembly we do lessons until break at 10.30. We have lunch at 12.00 until 1.o'clock .I take sandwiches. After lunch lessons again with a break at 2.30 and we finish at 3.10 After school on Tuesday we have drama club. Sometimes I go to tea with a friend or have one home.we change and have a drink and biscuit. Monday is Brownies. Sometimes if Dad is home we have a bike ride. Bed is at 6.45pm.
